FHanalyze package
=================

Intro
~~~~~

The FHanalyze package analyzes the readings that were stored into the Raspberry Pi's mongo db
by calls to the `FHmonitor package <https://fhmonitor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/FHmonitor.html#intro>`_.

.. automodule:: FHanalyze.analyze
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
